articles.title: Kim Jong Un Meets Participants in Meeting of KPA Logistic Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Meets Participants in Meeting of KPA Logistic Personnel
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), had a photo session with the participants in the second meeting of KPA logistic personnel. 
					 Kim Jong Un extended warm congratulations in the name of the KPA supreme commander to the participants who made signal achievements in the supply service, saying: The party and the country and its people always remember the efforts of the logistic personnel, who have devotedly worked for the servicepersons invariably in rain or shine, sharing the will and purpose with their supreme commander.
					
					 The second meeting of KPA logistic personnel marks an epochal turn as it provided an important landmark for defending and further glorifying the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in the field of supply service for the people's army and improving the supply service in conformity with the party's intention and demand, he said before having a photo session with its participants.
					
					 Saying that the party's trust and expectation in the logistic personnel are very great, he expressed belief that they would make a significant contribution to providing the soldiers with better living conditions as soon as possible.
					
					  Attending the session were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Jong Gak, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Indian National Seminar
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Indian National Seminar
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a message from the participants in the Indian national seminar on Songun politics and the country's sovereignty held on Dec. 13 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could have strong power enough to mercilessly smash the schemes of the barbarous aggressors, the message said, and went on:
					
					 Songun politics helps each country have its own powerful strength to effectively cope with the outsiders' threats, thus guaranteeing its sovereignty. 
					
					 It is crystal clear to all that Songun politics practically guarantees the country's independence and sovereignty. 
					
					 It is very fortunate that eternal General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided Songun politics. 
					
					 The message expressed belief that the DPRK would grow stronger and foil all obstructive maneuvers of the imperialists under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts Fabrication of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" at UN
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts Fabrication of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" at UN 
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a statement Thursday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK drafted a "human rights resolution" against it at a recent session of the UN General Assembly and put it on the agenda of the UN Security Council.
					 The statement branded this as a blatant challenge and a serious provocation against the dignified socialist system and the people in the DPRK, and a declaration of a war against it.
					
					 It vehemently denounced the south Korean puppet forces for acting as a cat's paw serving the U.S. while taking the lead in the anti-DPRK "human rights" farce at the UN.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group pulled up the DPRK over the non-existent "human rights issue", an act prompted by its black-hearted intention to tarnish the image of the DPRK and bring down its social system at any cost with the backing of American master, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 Also lurking behind the move is the Park Geun Hye group's intention to cover up the poor human rights record in south Korea that turned into the worst tundra of human rights due to the hideous fascist rule and unpopular rule, and divert elsewhere the public attention and thus tide over the serious political crisis.
					
					 As their attempt to stifle the DPRK went bust, the forces hostile toward the DPRK, including the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, are trying to dramatize the "north's human rights issue" in a bid to bring down the dignified social system in the DPRK. But this is a pipe dream that can never come true.
					
					 Now that the despicable anti-DPRK confrontational maniacs declared the reckless "war of human rights" against the DPRK, it will respond to them with resolute counteraction.
					
					 Our merciless and just punishment will be meted out first to the puppet group of traitors who are obsessed with escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen while acting as the stooge of the U.S.
					
					 The puppet group which challenged the dignity and social system of the DPRK through the hideous anti-DPRK "human rights" racket will be forced to experience a high price for its crimes.

articles.title: Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Ceremony of Awarding State Commendations Held in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to service personnel, working people and officials who rendered their services for ushering in a heyday of Songun Korea and demonstrating the dignity of the great Paektusan nation this year, a year of dynamic advance and great changes. 
					 A ceremony of awarding the state commendations for Juche 103 (2014) took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, service personnel, officials and other people who performed great labor feats in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of party and administrative organs in Pyongyang and local areas, meritorious persons and labor innovators attended the ceremony as observers.
					
					 Order of Kim Il Sung was awarded to Kim Jin Gun, the title of DPRK Labor Hero and gold medal (hammer and sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class to Ri Kwang Il and seven others, Kim Il Sung Prize went  to Pak Chang Sik, Kim Jong Il Prize to Kim Myong Sim and Jo Tok Hui, watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung to Ri Chol Su and nine others, citations of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to Jon Cha Gum and 17 others,  Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to Ri Kum Song and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Kim Jong Chol and five others.
					
					 Honorary titles and Order of National Flag First Class were also conferred upon persons of merit.

articles.title: Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
articles.content:
Workers and Members of GFTUK Meet
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday to mark the 3rd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said it was a historic event of decisive significance in the development of the revolutionary armed forces and the accomplishment of the Juche cause that the service personnel and people held Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, true to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un has firmly preserved the Juche-based military idea of Kim Jong Il and the exploits he performed in building the army through the outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has developed the revolutionary armed forces into a strong army that achieved the single-minded unity with his ardent love for comrades-in-arms and comrades and energetically led the KPA to play the role of a pace-setter and make a breakthrough in the building of an economic power and highly civilized socialist nation, they said, adding:
					
					 The revolutionary exploits he performed by strengthening the KPA into a powerful elite Paektusan revolutionary army and ushering in a new era of prosperity with his rare military wisdom, outstanding commanding art and noble virtues will always go down in the history of the country.

articles.title: Table-tennis Tournament for Disabled in DPRK
articles.content:
Table-tennis Tournament for Disabled in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A table-tennis tournament for the disabled goes on in the DPRK.
					 Taking part in the tournament, divided into several groups by age and sex, are a large number of disabled persons. Competitions are made in singles and doubles.
					
					 According to Yun Chol, secretary of the Korean Sports Association for the Disabled, disabled persons' desire to attend this annual sports event has grown stronger. They are greatly encouraged by the social welfare system, sports enthusiasm running high in the country and good results made in international para games.
					
					 Similar table-tennis contests took place in South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and Kangwon provinces, the secretary noted, adding he felt the advantages of the socialist system at the happy looks of disabled persons mixed with normal ones.
					
					 In the knockout singles of the disabled at the tournament, Ri Yong Nam, a doctor at the Railway Ministry Hospital, came first with five wins. He told KCNA that though he is a disabled man he would work harder for the society and collective while steadily developing his table-tennis technique.
					
					 Experts say that the double matches to be held on Dec. 27, the last day of the tournament, will be more interesting as competitions are to be made by pairs of a disabled person and an amateur.

articles.title: History: Three Famous Calligraphers of Korea
articles.content:
History: Three Famous Calligraphers of Korea
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Recorded in the Korean history are stories about three famous calligraphers--Kim Saeng, Han Ho and Kim Jong Hui.
					 Kim Saeng of low birth was a typical calligrapher dating back to the middle ages. He began to learn calligraphy in his childhood and had engaged himself in handwriting with brush until he was over eighty.
					
					 He had lived in a mountain cavern for more than 40 years, getting excellent at such styles of writing as ornamental seal characters, running style and cursive writing and earning fame at home and abroad.
					
					 His handwriting is characterized by boldness and vigor.
					
					 Han Ho was a calligrapher of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 He had practiced handwriting skills from his childhood, and his calligraphic works won popularity in other countries including Ming of China (1368-1644).
					
					 Kim Jong Hui, too, was a famous calligrapher like Han Ho.
					
					 He was versed in history, astronomy, mechanics, geography and music, while being good at painting and poetry.
					
					 The then people gave a high appreciation that he was the best in the three aspects--poetry, handwriting and painting.
					
					 In his lifetime, he wrote a lot of books about basic theory and technique on calligraphy.

articles.title: KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (2)
articles.content:
KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (2)
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) has scored enormous achievements in building a thriving nation in the new century of Juche.
					 The servicepersons, cherishing Kim Jong Il's patriotism deep in their mind, made a breakthrough in turning the country into an economic power and improving the people's living standard in the spirit of At a Go.
					
					 In those days, they created the Masikryong speed, a new Korean speed in the 21st century, while building the Masikryong Ski Resort and thus kindled the flame of a leap forward and innovation throughout the country.
					
					 The KPA finished the building of January 8 Fishery Station in a little more than two months.
					
					 It has completed pleasure parks, riding club, apartment houses for educators, scientists streets, etc. in recent three years.
					
					 Modernly-equipped foodstuff factories took their shapes one after another as model ones thanks to its devoted efforts.
					
					 True to the Workers' Party of Korea's intention to provide the servicepersons and civilians with more fish, fishery stations under the KPA made unprecedented innovation in fishing this year, too.
					
					 The KPA also stood in the van of a drive to turn Pyongyang City into the center of Songun (military-first) culture and the country into a socialist fairyland.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Politically-motivated Terrorism against Progressive Political Party Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Politically-motivated Terrorism against Progressive Political Party Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces on Dec. 19 prodded the "constitutional court" into making a decision on disbanding the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) and depriving lawmakers from the party of their membership of the "National Assembly".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday terms the puppet forces' undisguised death sentence passed on the UPP an unheard-of fascist tyrannical action of traitors against patriotism.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The programme and activities of the UPP for independence and democratization of south Korean society and reunification through alliance with the north do not pose any problem as they reflect the desire of the people. This is evidenced by the fact that the UPP entered the NA thanks to the support of the people. Accordingly, its programme and activities deserve praise.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye group forcibly disbanded the UPP by setting in motion the "constitutional court," fully revealing that it is a rare fascist junta which puts the successive ruling quarters into the shade.
					
					 It is a trite method of the fascist group to bestially crack down on progressive political parties and figures by linking them to the north whenever the ruling crisis grows deeper.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, who inherited "yusin", forcibly disbanded the UPP by linking it to the north, for the purpose of taking revenge for the disgrace and shame it suffered in the past "presidential election" and justifying its moves for confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and the building of its fascist system.
					
					 The "yusin" conservative remnants stoop to any infamy to escalate the confrontation and stay in power. Though the UPP was dissolved this time by this group, it is as clear as noonday that other progressive political parties will become the next target in the future and the whole of south Korea will turn into tundra of democracy and human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities Slammed for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities Slammed for Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Institute for Far Eastern Studies of Kyongnam University of south Korea conducted a survey among experts on reunification, diplomacy and security, according to KBS of south Korea on Dec. 21. The results showed that the majority of respondents accused the puppet government of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 They said if south-north relations are to improve, the "government's policy toward the north" should be changed.
					
					 They urged the "government" to lift the "May 24 step".

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Puppet Group for Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Puppet Group for Suppressing Progressive Forces
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea on December 23 carried an editorial condemning the suppression of progressive forces by the puppet group.
					 The editorial recalled that as soon as Pak Geun Hye blustered that the decision of the "constitutional court" to disband the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) was a "historic decision which firmly protected liberal democracy," all the ultra-right forces turned out with this as a signal.
					
					 It noted that soon after conservative organizations indicted all the members of the UPP on charges of the violation of the "Security Law," the prosecution started investigation as if it had been waiting for it, and conservative media are also keen on the campaign against "followers of the north."
					
					 It stressed that the people will make a final judgment of the decision of the court which is like turning back the hands of the clock of history.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Sexual Slavery under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Sexual Slavery under Fire in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea on Dec. 11 opened to public a document on sexual slavery committed by the Imperial Japanese Army which was submitted by a French inspection group to the Far Eastern Military Tribunal after World War II, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea. 
					 This document was provided by Hirofumi Hayashi, a professor at Kanto Gakuin University of Japan, at a press conference held in Paris to hold the Imperial Japanese Army accountable for sexual abuses in wartime.
					
					 According to data, 50 soldiers of the Imperial Japanese Army perpetrated violence against French women in Indonesia in 1947, forced them into sexual slavery and killed all of them later.
					
					 Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the council, said that historic records brought to light the fact that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was an organized crime committed by the Japanese government as a state policy under the command of the army.
					
					 Yun urged the international community to play its role in pressurizing Japan to admit its past sexual abuses and redress the crimes, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Police Authorities' Search for Eliminating Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Police Authorities' Search for Eliminating Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency of south Korea on Dec. 22 searched an office of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy and houses of its members by invoking the "Security Law", according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The police took such action for the mere reason that the co-representative and other members of the organization staged actions for reunification through federal formula and the abolition of the "Security Law" in solidarity with organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification which had been labeled the "organization benefiting the enemy".
					
					 On the same day the police searched a house of a pastor and an office of a peace church on charges that he attended a seminar sponsored by the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany at which he denounced the lighting of the Aegibong Light Tower as a psychological warfare against the north, had a contact with a person from the north, supporting its assertion, and made and distributed "documents benefiting the enemy".
					
					 Earlier, the police also searched an office of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 Whenever the south Korean fascist ruling quarters faced a ruling crisis, they cooked up conspiratorial cases, linking them to the north, and kicked up a whirlwind of suppression. It is their trite method.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Peace Activist Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Peace Activist Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Joint Measure Committee for Opposing Scattering of Anti-North Leaflets and Aegibong Light Tower in south Korea held a press conference around Aegi Hill in Kimpho City, Kyonggi Province on Dec. 23 to denounce the puppet group keen on suppressing a peace activist, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The puppet police on Dec. 22 searched a house and office of a pastor for the mere reason that he conducted peace activities against a psychological warfare through the Aegibong Light Tower.
					
					 At the press conference speakers condemned the police for searching his house on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" though he earnestly desired peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop at once the suppression of the peace activist and the racket labeling him "follower of the north".

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Disbandment of Progressive Party Slammed by Overseas Koreans Body
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Disbandment of Progressive Party Slammed by Overseas Koreans Body 
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Friends of Progress, an overseas Koreans' organization, issued a statement on Dec. 19.
					 The statement said that the decision made by the "constitutional court" of south Korea to disband the Unified Progressive Party on Dec. 19 was a proclamation of the second "yusin" by the daughter of dictator Park Chung-Hee and the beginning of the era of the Park Geun Hye dictatorship.
					
					 Overseas Koreans neither recognize Park Geun Hye as "president", and the "Saenuri Party" as a political party nor think there is democracy in south Korea, it noted, and went on:
					
					 We extend invariable support and encouragement to the democratic forces and figures of south Korea fighting against the Park Geun Hye dictatorship despite all difficulties and sacrifices.
					
					 We will fight against the Park Geun Hye dictatorship by all means and methods.

articles.title: U.S. Human Rights Abuses Disclosed by Korean Media in U.S.
articles.content:
U.S. Human Rights Abuses Disclosed by Korean Media in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A commentary disclosing the true colors of the U.S. pursuing an aggressive and anti-human rights policy peppered with lies and deceptions was posted on Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Dec. 22. 
					 The commentary accused the U.S. of claiming that cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment was made by the north.
					
					 The DPRK proposed a joint investigation but the Obama administration denied it, reminiscent of the early period after the occurrence of the Cheonan warship sinking accident, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has cooked up lots of false cases not only on the Korean Peninsula but also in the international community.
					
					 It is the assertion of American intellectuals with common sense that the U.S. should stand at an international court as an international war criminal, in fact.
					
					 The U.S., in particular, is an imperialist country which can never be pardoned by the Koreans. It is the U.S. imperialists which have pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK by setting in motion their followers while talking about the "human rights of the north".
					
					 The human rights issue is one of capitalist society where exploitation is rampant, but in socialist society the equal right is ensured and all people enjoy their life as masters.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Missions to Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Missions to Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Personages from all social strata in different countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries on Dec. 16 and 17 on the occasion of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets before portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length pictures of the President standing together with Kim Jong Il and paid high tribute to them. 
					
					 They included the representative of the Indian government, secretary of State of the Mongolian Foreign Ministry, international secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, leader of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (United), vice-chairman of the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), president of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran, vice-manager of the Iranian Diamond Company, vice-chairman of the German-Korean Parliamentary Friendship Group, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, chairman of the Trade and Monetary Association of Belarus, secretary of the C.C., the Communist Workers' Part
					
					 y of Belarus, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, chairman of the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, general secretary of the C.C., the New Communist Party of Britain, chairman of the C.C, the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), representative of the government of DR Congo, vice-commander of the Guards of President of DR Congo, representatives of political parties and organizations of Algeria, first secretary of the Cabinda Provincial Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), secretary 
					
					 general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and the general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 15.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates tasks to be fulfilled to resolutely uphold and preserve their ideas and exploits and add eternal shine to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Britain
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A joint remembrance meeting took place in London on Dec. 14 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting his undying revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were books on his great personality.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in his memory.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) who is also secretary general of the British committee for honoring the memory of Kim Jong Il, said the ideological and theoretical legacies left by him for the Korean people and other progressives in the world are really great.
					
					 A member of the Central Committee of the Socialist Labour Party of Britain said Kim Jong Il in his work "Socialism Is a Science" proved the scientific accuracy, truth and inevitability of victory of socialism.
					
					 The representative of the Korean Friendship Association UK said the august name of Kim Jong Il is shining as an outstanding statesman and iron-willed commander who developed and enriched the Juche idea and the Songun idea and laid a strong foundation for accomplishing the socialist cause by enforcing the Songun politics.
					
					 The chief of the northern district of the Coordinating Committee of the British Friends of the DPRK said although Kim Jong Il passed away, he will always be remembered by the progressives including those in Britain.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain who is chairman of the British committee for honoring the memory of Kim Jong Il, said the world people are confident of victory as Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il, is steering the Songun revolution, foiling all the imperialists' base plots and moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Annual General Meeting of Benin National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Annual General Meeting of Benin National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- An annual general meeting of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Cotonou of Benin on December 17. 
					 The meeting reviewed this year's activities of the committee and discussed a working plan for 2015. 
					
					 The participants reiterated the resolution to intensify the activities for the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people in their drive for defending the sovereignty of the country and building a thriving nation in the next year marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Russian Paper 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Tribuna on Dec. 18 carried a special write-up  illustrated  with photos of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the third anniversary his demise. 
					 The paper carried an article titled "Legacy of leader Kim Jong Il" which said:
					
					 What type of man leader Kim Jong Il was for Korea?
					
					 The Korean people unreservedly revere and praise him as the great leader. 
					
					 What is the outstanding exploits he performed for the development of the country?
					
					 The U.S. and its allies have disliked the DPRK since its birth and tried to stifle it by force of arms. But they failed to bring the DPRK to its knees. 
					
					 Since the end of the 1990s the U.S. has been making preparations for a fierce war against the DPRK. 
					
					 This situation compelled the DPRK to maintain its defence capability at a high level and make a great decision to develop its own nuclear weapons and delivery means. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il neither allowed the sovereignty of the country to be infringed upon in diplomacy nor made any compromise to the U.S. 
					
					 He made the greatest contributions to the work for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The DPRK has steadily developed the fields of economy and science including industry, agriculture and science despite outside blockade. 
					
					 Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, greeted a heyday of prosperity in construction, turning it into a modern city based on Juche-oriented architecture.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Egyptian, Syrian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Egyptian, Syrian Personages
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Egyptian and Syrian personages made public statements on Dec. 10 and 14 on the occasion of the third anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 The chairman of the General Trade Union of Workers in Agriculture and Irrigation of Egypt said that Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between Egypt and the DPRK and the happiness and prosperity of the two peoples. 
					
					 He added that he would always remember the exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, said that Kim Jong Il performed the greatest exploits to go down in the history of mankind till the last moments of his life. 
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Il for publishing a great many works giving clear answers to all questions arising in the revolution and construction through his tireless ideological and theoretical activities.    He went on:
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the Korean People's Army developed into an invincible army capable of defeating any formidable enemies and the DPRK is displaying its dignity as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 He also developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the mother party forming a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serving them and an invincible party with an iron discipline and high fighting efficiency.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and all other progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Travel Company on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Travel Company on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was posted by the MS Travel Company of Germany on its website on Dec. 19. 
					 The work, published on Aug. 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification, and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of them and the ways to do so.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de funcionarios de intendencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en conferencia de funcionarios de intendencia
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en la 2a conferencia de los funcionarios de intendencia del EPC.
					El Mariscal senalo que el partido, la patria y el pueblo no olvidan los esfuerzos de los funcionarios de intendencia quienes han marchado invariablemente por el camino de abnegacion para los militares compartiendo el alma y el proposito con el Comandante Supremo. Y envio una calurosa felicitacion en nombre del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los participantes en la conferencia quienes lograron exitos enorgullecedores en el trabajo de intendencia.
					
					Subrayo que el conclave deviene una oportunidad trascendental que preparo el importante jalon en mantener y defender las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il acumuladas en la rama del trabajo de intendencia del EPC y en mejorar el servicio de abastecimiento segun el proposito y la demanda del partido y se fotografio junto con los participantes.
					
					Son muy grandes la confianza y la esperanza del partido en los funcionarios de intendencia del EPC, recalco y manifesto la conviccion de que ellos contribuiran activamente a ofrecer cuanto antes magnificas condiciones de vida a los militares.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Jong Gak, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song y Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en comandancia de unidad 526
articles.content:
Levantadas estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en comandancia de unidad 526
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 24 de diciembre, quedaron levantadas en alto en la comandancia de la gran unidad combinada 526 del Ejercito Popular de Corea las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					Tuvo lugar la vispera la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en el acto Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil y otros miembros de mando del EPC, oficiales y soldados de la gran unidad combinada, empleados, familiares de militares, funcionarios y benemeritos de las unidades que contribuyeron al levantamiento de estatuas. 
					
					El descubrimiento estuvo a cargo de los funcionarios responsables del ejercito y  los miembros de mando de la gran unidad citada.
					
					Cuando se quito el velo, aparecieron las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos, simbolo de la victoria y gloria de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Al instante, las aclamaciones de "!viva!" estremecieron el cielo y la tierra y volaron los globos de goma decorando el cielo del lugar de la ceremonia de descubrimiento.
					
					Fue depositado ante las estatuas de bronce un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal 
					
					Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Seguidamente quedaron colocados los cestos de flores a nombre comun del CC del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el CDN de la RPDC y en nombre de la gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC.
					
					Ademas, fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Estado Mayor General del EPC, las unidades a todos niveles de la gran unidad combinada y las unidades donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu.
					
					Los participantes rindieron tributo a los Generalisimos antes sus estatuas de bronce.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de vicemarical del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El informante dijo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung organizo dicha unidad en el arduo periodo  de la guerra, envio a los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses como miembros de mando y la fortalecio como destacamento de combate capaz de aniquilar uno a cien enemigos y prosiguio:
					
					El Dirigente senalo que eran importantes los deberes de la gran unidad y dirigio abnegadamente para convertir a todos los puestos en una fortaleza inexpugnable.
					
					El deseo ardiente de los oficiales y soldados de la unidad de levantar las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos y transmitir para siempre sus hazanas se llevo a cabo gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					El informante exhorto a todos a unirse mas compactamente en torno al Comandante Supremo y luchar vigorosamente para adelantar cuanto antes el dia en que se completara con brillantez la causa revolucionaria del Songun iniciada  bajo la guia de los Generalisimos.
					
					Los participantes pasaron revista a las estatuas de bronce tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre el respecto.

articles.title: Ceremonia de condecoracion estatal en RPDC
articles.content:
Ceremonia de condecoracion estatal en RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de condecoracion estatal del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche a los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores y funcionarios, quienes contribuyeron mucho a glorificar este ano la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia del monte Paektu. 
					A la ocasion asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Phyong Hae, los funcionarios benemeritos del ejercito y sociedad quienes realizaron grandes meritos laborales en la construccion del Estado prospero socialista, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores.
					
					Participaron en calidad de observador los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los de partido y administracion de esta capital y localidades, los benemeritos e innovadores laborales. 
					
					La Orden Kim Il Sung fue concedida a Kim Jin Gun.
					
					El titulo del Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC, la Medalla de Oro (El Martillo y la Hoz) y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase fueron otorgados a Ri Kwang Il, Ri Ku Bom, Jong Kyong Jun, Ro Se Yong, An Hung Hak, Rim Tok Hwa, Kim Myong Dok y Hong Sun Gwang.
					
					El Premio Kim Il Sung fue conferido a Pak Chang Sik;  el Premio Kim Jong Il, a Kim Myong Sim y Jo Tok Hui, el reloj que lleva el nombre del Presidente  Kim Il Sung, a Ri Chol Su, Ri Kang Hae, Sin Song Bok, Ri Kwang Sop, Kim Jong Sil, Kim Song Il, Min Kyong Su, Jong Kum Chon, Hong Hyong Thae y Kim Chol Bom.
					
					Fue otorgado el diploma de honor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un a Jon Cha Gum, Pang Yong Song, Pak Chun Hwa, Ro Chong Man, Pak Sang Gun, Sin Chol Ryong, Kim Mun Sop, Yu Jong Su, Jang Yong Jip, Jo Ho Song, Kim Yong Gwang, Ri Jin Gun, Pak Hyon Uk, Ri Sun Sok, O Kyong Chol, Ri Pyong Nam, Kim Yong Il y Kim To Ho.
					
					Ri Kum Song fue condecorado con el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung, y Kim Jong Chol, Pak Yun Chol, Jang Jong Hun, Kim Jin Hyok, Han Kum Sok y Ri Kum Chol, con el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los titulos honorarios y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase fueron otorgados a los benemeritos.

articles.title: Efectuado acto festival de obreros y gremiales por 30 de diciembre
articles.content:
Efectuado acto festival de obreros y gremiales por 30 de diciembre
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un (30 de diciembre) como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 25 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto festival de los obreros y gremiales.
					Hubo discurso del presidente de la FGSC, Hyon Sang Ju y las intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que el nombramiento del Mariscal como Comandante Supremo del EPC en acato al legado del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, fue un acontecimiento historico de gran significado en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y en el cumplimiento de la causa del Juche.
					
					Se refirieron a que el Mariscal defiende y lleva adelante la autoctona ideologia militar y las proezas del Dirigente en materia de la construccion del ejercito.
					
					Aseveraron que el Mariscal consolido las fuerzas armadas como ejercito poderoso en que todos oficiales y soldados estan unidos compactamente con la noble camaraderia y dirige sabiamente el EPC para que este abriera la brecha en la construccion de la potencia economica y la de un Estado civilizado socialista.
					
					Acotaron que brillaran para siempre en los anales de la patria las proezas revolucionarias del Mariscal quien convirtio el EPC en el ejercito selecto del monte Paektu con su extraordinaria perspicacia militar, el arte de mando militar y nobles cualidades y abrio una nueva era de prosperidad.
